participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and dedicated, Emily has a nurturing nature typical of someone who works in the medical field. She is also adventurous, always seeking new experiences.
participant_1.background: i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i enjoy going to the park. i am now looking for a new job.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and energetic, Jake loves the thrill of riding his motorbike and enjoys the freedom it brings. He is also protective and values safety.
